column6:
Plz kindly send this message to your purchasing department, thanks a lot!

    Let me introduce our company briefly: Cixi Gstar Electric Appliance Co., Ltd was founded in 2009, who manufacture and export 8 million USD every year. We specialize in developing and producing Kitchen Utensil and has passed the BSCI factory audit since July 2013. After long-term cooperation, our company has established excellent business relationships with famous supermarkets clients such as Kmart ,Walmart, Sam’s Club, Bed Bath & Beyond, BJ's Wholesale Club, Woolworths, MACY’s etc.
